name: PitCharted
description:
Pitcharted was created for the Spring 2021 quarter CMPM 80K at UCSC.

This game was created in Construct 3 in the course of two weeks. The only limitation being we were limited to the free version. Which means we had to complete the entire project using only 50 events.

The theme for for our jam was Pitfall. 

Our team decided to create a de-make of uncharted though our scope during ideation was unrealistic for the amount of events that we had at our disposal. So we ended up going with just a driving shmup in order to re-use as much code as possible.

This project was created by:

Nick Pastoria, Timothy Lanthier, and Shubhangi Verma
